items.style rules: @media screen { #_id_ > .puiresp { display:grid; grid-template-rows:60px minmax(100px, 1fr) minmax(140px, 1fr) minmax(140px, 1fr) minmax(140px, 1fr); grid-template-columns:2fr 140px; grid-row-gap:16px; grid-column-gap:16px; overflow-x:hidden; overflow-y:hidden; } #_id_ { overflow-x:hidden; overflow-y:hidden; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(1) { grid-column-end:span 2; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(2) { grid-column-end:span 2; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(3) { grid-column-end:span 2; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(4) { grid-column-end:span 2; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(5) { grid-column-end:span 2; grid-row-end:span 1; grid-row-start:auto; } }

items.tool tip: Delete record permanently. Cannot be undone.

items.style rules: @media screen {   #_id_>.puiresp {     display: grid;     grid-template-rows: 1fr;     grid-template-columns: 275px 1fr 90px;     grid-row-gap: 16px;     grid-column-gap: 8px;     padding-top: 16px;     padding-right: 16px;     padding-bottom: 16px;     padding-left: 16px;   }#_id_>.puiresp>div {  display: flex;  align-content: center;  align-items: center;} }

#_id_>.puiresp {   display: grid;   grid-auto-rows: minmax(26px, 36px);   grid-template-columns: 105px minmax(105px, 1fr) 105px 120px;   grid-row-gap: 16px;   grid-column-gap: 8px;   padding-top: 16px;   padding-right: 16px;   padding-bottom: 16px;   padding-left: 16px;   align-content: space-around; }

#_id_ > .puiresp { display:grid; grid-auto-rows:minmax(26px, 36px); grid-template-columns:105px 1fr 105px 120px; grid-row-gap:16px; grid-column-gap:8px; padding-top:16px; padding-right:16px; padding-bottom:16px; padding-left:16px; align-content:space-around; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(1) { grid-column-end:span 2; grid-row-start:1; grid-column-start:1; grid-row-end:auto; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(2) { grid-row-start:3; grid-column-start:3; grid-column-end:auto; grid-row-end:auto; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(3) { grid-row-start:3; grid-column-start:4; grid-column-end:auto; grid-row-end:auto; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(4) { grid-row-start:2; grid-column-start:3; grid-column-end:span 1; grid-row-end:auto; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(5) { grid-row-start:2; grid-column-start:4; grid-column-end:span 1; grid-row-end:auto; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(6) { grid-row-start:1; grid-column-start:3; grid-column-end:auto; grid-row-end:auto; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(7) { grid-row-start:1; grid-column-start:4; grid-column-end:auto; grid-row-end:auto; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(8) { grid-row-start:2; grid-column-start:1; grid-column-end:auto; grid-row-end:auto; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(9) { grid-row-start:2; grid-column-start:2; grid-column-end:auto; grid-row-end:auto; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(10) { grid-row-start:3; grid-column-start:1; grid-column-end:auto; grid-row-end:auto; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(11) { grid-row-start:3; grid-column-start:2; grid-column-end:auto; grid-row-end:auto; }

#_id_ > .puiresp { display:grid; grid-auto-rows:minmax(26px, 36px); grid-template-columns:105px minmax(105px, 1fr) 105px 120px; grid-row-gap:16px; grid-column-gap:8px; padding-top:16px; padding-right:16px; padding-bottom:16px; padding-left:16px; align-content:space-around; }
